reviews.review: Interesting and fun co-op game
联机拌嘴真不错

One of the best games I've ever played. The story is funny and engaging. The puzzles are fun and challenging. When you finally find the solution there's that AAAH-moment that feels great. Voice acting is top-notch. The game also holds up really well despite being 8 years old.

Recommended!

A videogame classic, still holds up even after 8 years. 

+ Engaging story
+ Puzzle creator community still thriving, lots of interesting puzzles
+ Well polished

- Its age may be a turnoff for some gamers

jees

Portal 2 is an industrial-themed masterpiece.  The difficulty of the puzzles may not be too high, but it's a fun and endearing adventure nonetheless.  While Portal 1 opted for a more atmospheric approach, Portal 2 went full industrial, and it owned it.  The singleplayer is extensive, the co-op has endless replay value (especially through custom maps), and the map builder is very intuitive.

Portal 2 is a timeless classic. I don't even know how many years later it is from its release, but I keep coming back to playing this masterpiece. Between the story and the community offering thousands of custom levels to choose from, there's a lot to keep you interested. I would recommend this to anyone who hasn't played it yet.

Historia sencilla y humor exquisito, si a eso le agregamos el precio irrisorio que alcanza cuando esta en descuento y las horas de entretenimiento que brinda es sin duda alguna un juego al que deberian darle una oportunidad, claro, siempre y cuando te gusten los juegos de logica y puzzles.
Posee mecanicas simples de aprender en un principio pero que gradualmente puedes mejorar para superarte a ti mismo, y asi volver a repetir los mismos mapas una y otra vez mejorando los tiempos o el reducendo el uso de portales.

2019 and this game still great

Игра настоящий шедевр, в ней прекрасно все: геймплей с настоящими сложными головоломками, интересный сюжет, хорошая графика, смешные шутки, и большое количество пасхалок и отсылок. В общем очень рекомендую пройти первую и вторую часть, так как это одни из наилучших игр всего времени.
